suite.name: Cadastro

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Dado que eu tenho um novo produto
Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the results.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Então visualizo este item no catálogo
Table Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies table contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Dado que eu tenho um novo produto
Get Product Json
Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.
kw.msg: ${file} = { "name": "Master System II", "cat": "Consoles", "price": "99.99", "desc": "8 Bits com Alex Kid na memória!", "producers": ["Sega"], "image": "master2.jpg" }

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the results.
kw.msg: ${json} = {'name': 'Master System II', 'cat': 'Consoles', 'price': '99.99', 'desc': '8 Bits com Alex Kid na memória!', 'producers': ['Sega'], 'image': 'master2.jpg'}
${product_json} = {'name': 'Master System II', 'cat': 'Consoles', 'price': '99.99', 'desc': '8 Bits com Alex Kid na memória!', 'producers': ['Sega'], 'image': 'master2.jpg'}

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.
kw.msg: ${product_json} = {'name': 'Master System II', 'cat': 'Consoles', 'price': '99.99', 'desc': '8 Bits com Alex Kid na memória!', 'producers': ['Sega'], 'image': 'master2.jpg'}

kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
